DATA.TEXT: A curious-looking octopus pops up from your rocket-box, excitedly messing with its controls.
Hey, cool cardboard box! What's your name?
He stares up at you with big, glowing eyes, expecting a response. You hesitate for a while, and nothing seems to come.
Okay! So, uh, I'm Hugo! I, I was just wondering... May I go with you?
My dad doesn't let me out a lot, you know, because of the war! But today that everyone quit fighting...
Well, I thought it could be fun to go out to explore! So, uh, yeah, may I go with you?
You just can't say no to that, can you?
Thanks, little dude!! You pinky-promise you won't tell dad, right?
Cool! Alright, space, here we go!!
